# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="79b9c-102">Практическое руководство. Удаление автоматически сгенерированных столбцов элемента управления DataGridView в Windows Forms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="79b9c-103">Если для элемента управления <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> настроено Автоформирование своих столбцов на основе данных из источника данных, можно выборочно опустить определенные столбцы.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="79b9c-104">Это можно сделать, вызвав метод <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> в коллекции <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="79b9c-105">Кроме того, можно скрыть столбцы из представления, задав для свойства <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> значение `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="79b9c-106">Этот метод полезен при необходимости отображения скрытых столбцов в определенных условиях или при необходимости доступа к данным в столбцах без их отображения.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="79b9c-107">Удаление автоматически сформированных столбцов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="79b9c-108">Вызовите метод <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> для коллекции <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="79b9c-109">Скрытие автоматически сформированных столбцов</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="79b9c-110">Задайте для свойства <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> столбца значение `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="79b9c-112">Компиляция кода</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="79b9c-113">Для этого примера требуются:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="79b9c-114">Элемент управления <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> с именем `dataGridView1`, привязанный к таблице, содержащей `Fax` и `CustomerID` столбцы, такие как `Customers` таблица в образце базы данных Northwind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
- <span data-ttu-id="79b9c-115">ссылки на сборки <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> и <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType>.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="79b9c-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
